mtc:Taxon.name: Source.Length.Form.Straightness.Surrface

mtc:Parameter.name: StartPointX
mtc:Parameter.mtc:Definition: Start Point on the X-Axis distance from the reference

mtc:Parameter.name: StartPointY
mtc:Parameter.mtc:Definition: Start Point on the Y-Axis distance from the reference

mtc:Parameter.name: EndPointX
mtc:Parameter.mtc:Definition: End Point on the X-Axis distance from the reference

mtc:Parameter.name: EndPointY
mtc:Parameter.mtc:Definition: End Point on the Y-Axis distance from the reference

mtc:Parameter.name: Reference
mtc:Parameter.mtc:Definition: DIN, ISO, ASTM, ASME, or Federal G-Series Measurement Specifications [plain text]

mtc:Taxon.mtc:Definition: The minimum normal (perpendicular) distance between two parallel planes that fully contain a surface along a specified line.
